name: IODINE AND IODIDE
cautions: Cautions children; not for long-term treatment
side-effects:
Side-effects hypersensitivity reactions including coryza-like
symptoms, headache, lacrimation, conjunctivitis, pain in salivary
glands, laryngitis, bronchitis, rashes; on prolonged treatment depression,
insomnia, impotence; goitre in infants of mothers taking iodides
pregnancy: Pregnancy neonatal goitre and hypothyroidism; see also notes above
